title: Bruce Willis & Emma Heming Willis Mark 16 Years Together w/ Cute Pics – Entertainment News 24/7 Updates
text: Bruce Willis and Emma Heming Willis are celebrating a major milestone! The couple marked 16 years together on Dec. 27, with the former model, 45, honoring the occasion with Instagram photos of her and the actor, 68, enjoying a romantic moment. “16 years with this special man. My love and adoration for him only grows,” she wrote in her caption. Emma also reposted the pics to her Instagram story and noted how quickly the years have passed. “16 years together?! Lord where did the time go,” she continued, adding, “Smitten” and “Sweet 16.” The CocoBaba founder also shared a selfie video about how she’s handling the holidays and anniversaries amid her husband’s frontotemporal dementia diagnosis. Emma and Bruce, who tied the knot in March 2009, share two daughters, Mabel, 11 and Evelyn, 9. The “Die Hard” actor is also dad to three more daughters: Rumer, Scout, and Tallulah, who he shares with ex-wife Demi Moore and recently, their blended family has been candid about Bruce’s health struggles.
